title: after game disconnect
body:
after pretty much every game, it says you have been disconnected and push the reconnect button to reconnect but there's nothing there. when  i try to join a new game there's just a loading symbol and i have to close the client and open it again. I uninstalled the client and reinstalled it but its still there and its annoying

what should i do

replies.body:
Disconnections after a match is typically an indication that there's an unstable connection between you and the servers. There are plenty of potential causes, but you'll find the most frequent ones addressed in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

If you continue to see this issue after working through those steps, please inform me.
